explanation: [0-0] A boy in white pants and a red scarf stands with his hands clasped in front of a dense forest. Behind him, a person in an orange outfit with yellow makeup on their face holds a yellow knife in their right hand and looks at the boy.

[0-7] Next, the person with yellow makeup comes behind the boy, grabs his hair, and raises the knife in their hand. The boy keeps his hands clasped and looks at the camera. Immediately afterwards, red flames appear in the picture. A person in red clothes with black makeup on their face stands on the left, looking at the camera and grabbing the hand of the person holding the knife. The person with yellow makeup turns to look at the person who suddenly appeared. Then, the person with black makeup lets go, raises their leg, and kicks at the person with yellow makeup. At this time, the boy turns around, notices the person with black makeup, and kneels before him. The person with yellow makeup also stands still and looks at the person with black makeup. Then, the person with black makeup walks up to the boy and strokes his head.
